If inventory on a certain item is too high, the weather shifts, or sales need a boost, local ad programs can be triggered on the right channels to ensure each location is connecting with local customers in the right places and hitting their sales goals. Each of our locations can now achieve their local goals based on their unique, timely business needs. Ads can be launched instantly, behind the scenes, so our locations will see real results, while our GMs stay focused on what they do best. We’ve run ads, inconsistently at best. It was time to present our system with an effective, cohesive program that gets ads into every market. When we’ve tried previously, the algorithms consistently pushed our ads to larger metros that didn’t necessarily need the attention. We chose to partner with Evocalize to efficiently and effectively deliver ads in our markets that need them the most, across the platforms where our guests are engaging. 

The scale these tools offer, and the value they bring to our locations and the system as a whole, is second to none. With the power of Evocalize, Port of Subs is transforming digital marketing complexity into simplicity for our franchisees. With just a few clicks, we empower operators to conquer local markets, optimize performance across major channels, drive loyalty, boost revenue, and streamline efficiency — all while maintaining brand control.

SeoSamba’s Franchise Marketing Operation System, or FMOS,  enables Brands, multi-unit and single unit franchisees to manage SEO, social media, performance and content marketing efforts across any number of territories, locations, websites from a single cloud-based interface while empowering local management.

SeoSamba’s FMOS framework also includes a powerful CRM solution built for multi-location businesses in mind and a specific CRM edition built for franchise development. FisherZucker LLC is a full-service law firm with a national practice dedicated almost exclusively to franchise, distribution and licensing matters. 
                                        No Hard Selling. Confidently connect, learn and expand your network.
                                     FisherZucker LLC is a full-service law firm with a national practice dedicated almost exclusively to franchise, distribution and licensing matters. The firm has offices in Pennsylvania and New Jersey. Our lawyers have extensive experience in Pre-Litigation counseling, litigation, arbitration and mediation in trademark infringement, non-compete, antitrust, collections, under-reporting and encroachment claims. In business transactions, our clients look to us to overcome obstacles and close deals. In litigation, our clients count on tactical and strategic legal advice, calculated to accomplish the desired business result, from the earliest stage of the case. The firm litigates on behalf of franchisors throughout the country and provides advice on franchise development, regulatory compliance, distribution and trademark, trade secret and copyright licensing and protection matters. We have represented several of the largest private equity firms in connection with due diligence on franchise systems and preparing agreement of sales and other transaction documents for deals in excess of $250 million. We also provide these private equity clients with day-to-day advice with respect to legal issues surrounding operating a franchise system. NOCAP Sports is a leading athlete marketing and technology company capitalizing on recent changes allowing college athletes to monetize their name, image and likeness (NIL).  
                                        No Hard Selling. Confidently connect, learn and expand your network.
                                     Founded in 2020 by former athletes, technology professionals and university compliance officials, NOCAP Sports was created to provide trusted, safe and secure solutions for athletes and advertisers entering the new NIL era. What began with simple workflows and automated compliance capabilities quickly evolved to become a more comprehensive platform for these stakeholders – and one focused more holistically on athletes’ NIL journeys within and beyond their collegiate experience. Today we are a growing team of (even more) former athletes, with an infusion of talent from the advertising, consumer packaged goods, apparel and Web3 industries, among others, and access to thousands of athletes across all levels. With these unique perspectives and our sizable, diverse athlete network, we aim to usher in a new era in athlete marketing – an era in which athletes are equitably rewarded for their contribution to sports and culture, and advertisers are routinely enabled to capitalize on athletes’ influence among fans. FIELD SERVICE MANAGEMENT FOR HOME SERVICES: The Platform for Managing and Operating Your Home Services Brand 
                                        No Hard Selling. Confidently connect, learn and expand your network.
                                     Upon its founding in 2013, serviceminder.io had one mission in mind: to help home service (and commercial service) franchise businesses acquire and convert more leads, schedule more appointments, close more deals and communicate with clients more effectively. It began with a world-class CRM built for field service with mapping, automated scheduling and dispatch. Then they added best-in-breed proposal writing with support for options, online deposits and payments, electronic signatures and reporting. Next, they perfected integrated email marketing and automation tools, fleet routing, integrated two-way texting, mapping and campaign budgeting enabling teams to measure revenue from campaigns and track cost per lead and revenue per client at the location and brand level. Oh, and dialed in reporting and analytics so locations and brands can better manage and grow. The serviceminder.io team knows every brand is different. Whether you are moving from a single platform or from a group where everyone uses sticky notes and Excel, the serviceminder.io team creates a plan to make your on-boarding process as smooth as possible. They’ve been members of the International Franchise Association as Supplier Forum members since 2015 and were awarded preferred supplier member status with Franchise Supplier Network in 2021, prior to FSN’s official membership program launch in September of 2022. The world’s most intelligent franchise social media and reputation management platform 
                                        No Hard Selling. Confidently connect, learn and expand your network.
                                     Rallio is a powerful SaaS platform combining cloud-based social media technology, artificial intelligence and employee advocacy. As the supplier of choice for franchise organizations, Rallio enables multi-location brands and operators to optimize their social media engagement, while managing their entire social media presence, online reputation, and online directory listings in one dashboard for all locations. By automating agency-like services and employee advocacy across their social media pages, brands multiply their reach exponentially and experience rapid month-over-month growth on social media. Rallio technology provides a complete social media ecosystem allowing manufacturers, corporate brands and their locations, employees and customers to build a local community, share experiences and drive local business. The Rallio Local division utilizes additional technology to efficiently help locations grow their local online presence, manage their reputation, recruit talent, and drive engagement and local business. The Rallio team is about having fun, making a difference and producing exceptionally creative results. The team is personable, highly intelligent, collaborative and results-focused. Ideas are welcomed, successes are celebrated, and personal and professional development is fostered. Mission: To “Rally”​ together an online community for businesses in order to improve trust, engagement and local sales.
